item.title: 埃隆·马斯克的X平台遭遇大范围服务中断
item.description: 据监测网站Downdetector称，周一有数千名用户报告无法访问埃隆·马斯克的社交媒体平台X。【原文：Thousands of users reported issues accessing Elon Musk’s social media platform X on Monday, according to monitoring website Downdetector.】

item.title: 奥地利希望下任欧洲央行行长人选按常规时间表推进
item.description: 奥地利财政部长马库斯·马尔特鲍尔表示，他支持在任命下一任欧洲央行行长时遵循标准时间表。【原文：Austrian Finance Minister Markus Marterbauer said he backs sticking with the standard timeline in appointing the next European Central Bank president.】

item.title: 世界银行削减肯尼亚住房项目的商业资金
item.description: 世界银行已将其计划帮助肯尼亚从商业贷款机构筹集资金用于该国住房和土地改革项目的金额削减了近三分之二。【原文：The World Bank has slashed by almost two thirds the amount of money it planned to help Kenya mobilize from commercial lenders for the nation’s housing and land reform programs.】

item.title: 阿伯丁称78亿欧元收购要约低估公司价值
item.description: 阿伯丁集团将对某财团收购InPost SA的要约投反对票，称该提案未能反映这家波兰包裹柜运营商的内在价值及长期增长轨迹。【原文：Aberdeen Group Plc will vote against a consortium’s buyout offer for InPost SA, saying the proposal fails to reflect the Polish parcel locker operator’s intrinsic value or long-term growth trajectory.】

item.title: 法国认为在提升欧元全球地位方面应保持谨慎
item.description: 法国政府对欧洲寻求增强欧元的国际作用感到犹豫不决，并呼吁评估经济风险。【原文：The French government is getting cold feet about Europe seeking to strengthen the international role of the euro and calling for an assessment of the economic risks.】

item.title: 巴塞尔协议将对美国银行实施新的抵押贷款资本要求
item.description: 随着美联储即将公布与《巴塞尔协议III》相关的银行资本提案，美国贷款机构即将面临新的抵押贷款要求。【原文：US lenders are poised to see new mortgage-loan requirements as the Federal Reserve comes closer to unveiling a long-awaited bank capital proposal tied to Basel III.】

item.title: 银行筹备出售巴斯夫涂料40亿欧元收购债务
item.description: 银行正准备出售约40亿欧元（47亿美元）的债务，为凯雷集团收购巴斯夫涂料业务提供融资。【原文：Banks are preparing to sell about €4 billion ($4.7 billion) of debt to finance Carlyle Inc.’s acquisition of BASF SE’s coatings business.】

item.title: 欧洲煤炭期货在俄罗斯港口遭袭后延续涨势
item.description: 欧洲煤炭期货连续第四日上涨，此前俄罗斯黑海一处重要煤炭出口港口遭遇无人机袭击，而主要出口国印尼正收紧供应。【原文：European coal futures climbed for a fourth day, after a drone attack on a Russian Black Sea port that handles sizable exports of the fuel and as major shipper Indonesia tightens supply.】

item.title: 尼日利亚通胀率意外放缓，央行利率决议前夕
item.description: 尼日利亚1月份通胀率意外放缓，为政策制定者下周重启降息周期创造了空间。【原文：Nigerian inflation unexpectedly slowed in January, providing room for policymakers to resume their rate-cutting cycle next week.】

item.title: 里夫斯可能陷入布鲁塞尔、蝙蝠和蝾螈的两难境地
item.description: 在蕾切尔·里夫斯的优先事项排序中，新建住房比阻碍工程的"微型蜗牛"等野生动物更为重要。但这位财政大臣虽屡屡抨击英国对自然界的严格保护措施，其与欧盟的和解进程却可能迫使其做出令人难堪的政策逆转。【原文：In Rachel Reeves’ hierarchy of priorities, building new homes is more important than “microscopic snails” and other wildlife standing in the way. But while the Chancellor of the Exchequer has repeatedly railed against Britain’s strict protections for the natural world, her rapprochement with the European Union could soon force an embarrassing U-turn.】

item.title: 堡垒资本最新私募债务基金力邀保险公司入伙
item.description: 据知情人士透露，堡垒投资集团正在为其最新基金增添一项保险公司友好的特性，该基金主要投资于直接企业贷款。【原文：Fortress Investment Group is adding an insurer-friendly feature to its latest fund, which will primarily invest in direct corporate loans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲旗舰气候工具测试政治边界
item.description: 该地区碳排放配额市场正吸引着各国政府的关注，这些政府都担心选民的强烈反对。【原文：The region’s market for carbon permits is drawing attention from governments wary of voter backlash.】

item.title: 特朗普广泛征收金属关税开始适得其反，迫使重新审视政策
item.description: 美国对钢铁和铝产品征收关税的漫无目的做法即将转向更有针对性的方式【原文：The scattershot approach to US steel and aluminum tariffs is set to become more targeted】

item.title: 马斯克收购案为X应用带来新转折，使其成为全能应用
item.description: SpaceX与xAI合并后，社交平台处于不同位置【原文：Social platform in different position after combination of SpaceX-xAI】

item.title: 从茶叶到科技：英国Halma公司乘上超大规模企业投资浪潮
item.description: 一家起源可追溯至19世纪茶园的富时100指数公司，正乘着人工智能驱动的数据中心投资浪潮发展壮大。【原文：A FTSE 100 company whose origins trace back to 19th-century tea plantations is riding the wave of AI-driven data center spending.】

item.title: 历经两年战火洗礼，以色列经济重回上升轨道
item.description: 自加沙战争爆发以来，以色列去年经济增长首次加速。【原文：Israel’s economic growth accelerated last year for the first time since the start of the war in Gaza.】

item.title: 为何欧洲可能希望加快选定下一任欧洲央行行长
item.description: 法国极右翼总统当选的威胁可能加速拉加德继任者的遴选进程。【原文：The threat of a far-right French president could speed up the process to chose Lagarde’s successor.】

item.title: 人工智能抛售潮背后的核心矛盾
item.description:
人工智能引发的股市动荡折射出两种截然不同的理论。二者不可能同时成立。 

【原文：

The stock market turmoil unleashed by AI reflects two distinct theories. Both can’t be right. 

】

item.title: 印度公路管理局计划于三月启动基础设施信托首次公开募股
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度国家公路管理局正准备推出其基础设施投资信托的首次公开募股，最早可能于下月启动，募资规模最高可达570亿卢比（约合6.29亿美元）。【原文：The National Highways Authority of India is preparing to launch an initial public offering of its infrastructure investment trust, which could raise as much as 57 billion rupees ($629 million), as soon as next month, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利认为南非预算案将延续债券上涨势头
item.description: 摩根士丹利分析师表示，南非财政部长伊诺克·戈东瓦纳将于本月下旬公布预算案，届时南非债券的上涨势头有望获得进一步提振。【原文：The rally in South African bonds is set to gain further impetus when Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana unveils his budget later this month, according to analysts at Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 印度1月贸易赤字扩大，美印临时协议前夕
item.description: 印度1月份贸易逆差扩大，而就在几周前，新德里刚与美国达成降低关税的临时协议。【原文：India’s trade deficit widened in January, just weeks before New Delhi agreed to an interim pact with the US to lower tariffs.】

item.title: 高盛称英国国债将无视政治风险，2026年表现强劲
item.description: 高盛集团策略师表示，受英国央行降息推动，英国债券将在2026年反弹，使政府借贷成本降至2024年以来的最低水平。【原文：UK bonds will rally in 2026 to send government borrowing costs to the lowest since 2024, driven by Bank of England interest-rate cuts, according to a Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategist.】

item.title: 潜艇技术公司加布勒集团计划在法兰克福上市
item.description: 加布勒集团是一家潜艇技术部件制造商，其大部分收入来自国防合同。该公司宣布计划在法兰克福进行首次公开募股。【原文：Gabler Group, a maker of submarine technology components that derives most of its revenue from defense contracts, announced plans for an initial public offering in Frankfurt.】

item.title: 高盛分析师斯奈德称，分析师对软件行业盈利前景转为乐观
item.description: 高盛集团策略师指出，尽管市场因人工智能颠覆性担忧而抛售软件股，分析师们仍上调了对软件股的盈利预期。【原文：Analysts are lifting earnings estimates for software stocks, undeterred by the selloff over artificial intelligence disruption worries, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 印度收紧贷款政策，经纪商被迫重新审视融资策略
item.description: 印度收紧对从事股票和商品自营交易企业的银行贷款标准，此举将迫使这些公司转向其他融资渠道。【原文：India’s move to tighten bank lending norms for firms engaged in proprietary trading of shares and commodities is set to push these companies toward alternative sources of capital.】

item.title: 罗斯班克正洽谈以逾30亿美元收购两家美国公司
item.description: 罗斯班克工业公司（Rosebank Industries Plc）——前梅尔罗斯工业公司（Melrose Industries Plc）高管们最新成立的收购平台——正就收购两家美国企业进行深入谈判，交易总额（含债务）达30.5亿美元。【原文：Rosebank Industries Plc, the latest buyout vehicle of former Melrose Industries Plc executives, is in advanced discussions to acquire two US businesses for a total of $3.05 billion including debt.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉与沙特亿万富豪家族投资埃及早餐项目
item.description: 阿联酋3300亿美元的主权财富基金、沙特亿万富豪家族以及日本SBI投资公司共同参与了埃及初创企业Breadfast的最新融资轮。这家电商公司正考虑将业务扩展至其他非洲国家。【原文：The United Arab Emirates’ $330 billion sovereign wealth fund, a Saudi billionaire family and Japan’s SBI Investment Co. have backed Egyptian startup Breadfast in its latest financing round, as the e-commerce company considers expanding into other African countries.】

item.title: 比特币连续四周下跌后寻求方向
item.description: 比特币连续第四周下跌后出现波动，随着周末涨势消退，这种加密货币正努力寻找明确方向。【原文：Bitcoin fluctuated after posting its fourth consecutive weekly loss, with the cryptocurrency struggling to find clear direction as a weekend rally fizzled.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦总理伊姆兰·汗以健康为由申请保释
item.description: 巴基斯坦前总理伊姆兰·汗以在狱中眼疾恶化为由，正积极争取获释。与此同时，其盟友在议会大楼的静坐抗议已进入第三天。【原文：Pakistan’s former Prime Minister Imran Khan is pressing for his release, citing a deteriorating eye condition in prison, as his allies enter the third day of a sit-in protest in parliament.】

item.title: AMD通过扩大与塔塔集团的AI合作，在印度市场向英伟达发起挑战
item.description: 超微半导体公司正与塔塔咨询服务公司合作，在印度部署这家美国芯片制造商的最新人工智能数据中心技术，以此在全球增长最快的市场之一挑战英伟达公司。【原文：Advanced Micro Devices Inc. is partnering with Tata Consultancy Services Ltd. to deploy the US chipmaker’s latest AI data center technology in India, challenging Nvidia Corp. in one of the world’s fastest-growing markets.】
